column4: I am trying to create a folder to develop a website under /var/www/
I tried the following to give the permission: sudo chmod -R 777 /var/www/
I am trying to assign the right permissions
theoretically I undersntand it...  just haven't put it into practice yet
however it just seems that it does not work
I still can't create the directory
bekks for what it's worth, I've experienced the same thing in the past, namely with external harddrives
ok... lol..   I just want to paste a directory that contains the files of my website inside the /var/www directory...
Or did I assume too much =)
yeah I don't actually have a solution.   But I've encountered that before and it's very frustrating.  I just wanted to let you know you're not crazy
I simply want to give x user full permissions to that folder
